Posts.Content: Oct 20, 2012 11:24PM Annie17 wrote: Hi Becky, I am 18 yrs and was diagnosed this summer. What kept me strong through evething was staying positive, and a lot of prayer. I don't know if you are religious or not but even some of my non-religous friends turned to prayer to deal with my diagnosis. Thoughts and prayers are with you!
Posts.Title: 31 years old, just diagnosed IDC beckstar18 msphil
